vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (REther.sol#117-179) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (REther.sol#143)
	-transferFrom (REther.sol#157)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
REther.getCashPrior (REther.sol#2789-2795) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(err == MathError.NO_ERROR)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._addReservesInternal (REther.sol#2456-2468):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (REther.sol#2457-2458)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (REther.sol#2464-2465)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._reduceReserves (REther.sol#2519-2529):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (REther.sol#2520-2521)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (REther.sol#2526-2527)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._setInterestRateModel (REther.sol#2584-2594):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (REther.sol#2585-2586)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (REther.sol#2591-2592)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (REther.sol#2591-2592)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (REther.sol#2600-2630):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (REther.sol#2619-2621)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (REther.sol#2622-2624)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._setIronController (REther.sol#2388-2407):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newIronController.isIronController(),marker method returned false) (REther.sol#2396-2397)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ironController (REther.sol#2399-2400)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._setReserveFactor (REther.sol#2412-2422):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (REther.sol#2413-2414)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (REther.sol#2419-2420)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.accrueInterest (REther.sol#1614-1692):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (REther.sol#1631)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (REther.sol#1683)
	- borrowIndex (REther.sol#1684)
	- totalBorrows (REther.sol#1685)
	- totalReserves (REther.sol#1686)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.borrowInternal (REther.sol#1945-1953):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (REther.sol#1946)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (REther.sol#1952)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (REther.sol#1952)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in REther.constructor (REther.sol#2686-2703):
	External calls:
	- initialize(ironController_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (REther.sol#2696-2698)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (REther.sol#2699-2700)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.initialize (REther.sol#1255-1286):
	External calls:
	- err = _setIronController(ironController_) (REther.sol#1269)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (REther.sol#1273)
	- borrowIndex (REther.sol#1274)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (REther.sol#2159-2174):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (REther.sol#2160)
	- error = RTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (REther.sol#2166)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,RTokenCollateral) (REther.sol#2173)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (REther.sol#2173)

Reentrancy in RToken.repayBorrowInternal (REther.sol#2038-2046):

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ REther.sol#1170) shadows:
	- ExponentialNoError.fraction (function @ REther.sol#1042-1044)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign

Reentrancy in RToken.borrowFresh (REther.sol#1967-2031):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (REther.sol#1969)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (REther.sol#2019)
	- accountBorrows (REther.sol#2020)
	- totalBorrows (REther.sol#2021)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.initialize (REther.sol#1255-1286):

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _notEntered (REther.sol#1285)
	- decimals (REther.sol#1282)
	- name (REther.sol#1280)
	- symbol (REther.sol#1281)

	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (REther.sol#1233): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (REther.sol#2668-2671): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function enterMarkets(address[] calldata RTokens) external returns (uint[] memory);
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter 'RTokens' of IronControllerInterface.enterMarkets (REther.sol#11) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter 'RToken' of IronControllerInterface.exitMarket (REther.sol#12) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function mintAllowed(address RToken, address minter, uint mintAmount) external returns (uint);
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter 'RToken' of IronControllerInterface.mintAllowed (REther.sol#16) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function mintVerify(address RToken, address minter, uint mintAmount, uint mintTokens) external;
